scripts.package-mac: rm node_modules/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg.exe || cp ffmpeg/osx/ffmpeg node_modules/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.package-linux: rm node_modules/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg.exe || cp ffmpeg/linux/ffmpeg node_modules/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg && electron-builder build --linux
scripts.package-win: rm node_modules/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg || cp ffmpeg/win/ffmpeg.exe node_modules/ffmpeg-static/ffmpeg.exe && electron-builder build --win --x64
